name: snort-ip-blocklist-feed
label: Snort IP Blocklist Feed
description:
Snort is an open-source, free and lightweight network intrusion detection system (NIDS) software for Linux and Windows to detect emerging threats. This connector facilitates automated operations related to fetching the list indicators and ingestion of daily threat feeds.

This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: The service-based URL to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.description: Retrieves the Snort IP Blocklist IP addresses from the Snort IP Blocklist Feed server.
operations.title: Get Indicators
